replies.bodyText:
It's needed yes, otherwise when testing the case where we don't create the user then fetch it to check, the underlying code attempts to return an i18n error message and does a NPE when fetching the locale from the request (which is supposed to always exist).
For the removal of the commented-out line I'll postpone, the cleanup commit was just for whitespace and this whole code needs to be rewritten anyway for OpenSAML 3 in the medium term...
